stories.title: The Tortoise and the Hare
stories.blurb: A fast hare races a slow tortoise and discovers that focus and perseverance can beat arrogance.
stories.moral: Slow and steady effort often leads to success

stories.title: The Lion and the Mouse
stories.blurb: A tiny mouse repays a mighty lionâ€™s kindness, proving that even the smallest friend can make the biggest difference.
stories.moral: Kindness is never wasted, no matter how small it seems

stories.title: The Fox and the Grapes
stories.blurb: A hungry fox repeatedly tries to reach grapes hanging high on a vine, then walks away calling them sour.
stories.moral: It is easy to dislike what you cannot have

stories.title: The Boy Who Cried Wolf
stories.blurb: A shepherd boy repeatedly tricks villagers by falsely crying wolf, until no one believes him when danger comes.
stories.moral: Liars are not believed even when they speak the truth.

stories.title: The Ant and the Grasshopper
stories.blurb: An ant works hard to prepare for winter while a grasshopper wastes time singing and playing.
stories.moral: Hard work today brings comfort tomorrow

stories.title: The Dog and the Shadow
stories.blurb: A dog carrying meat loses it while snapping at his own reflection in the water.
stories.moral: Greed can make you lose what you already have

stories.title: The Goose and the Golden Eggs
stories.blurb: A greedy owner kills his goose hoping to get all the gold at once and loses everything.

stories.title: The Bundle of Sticks
stories.blurb: A father teaches his sons the power of unity by showing them that a bundle of sticks is stronger than a single stick.

stories.title: The Lion and the Boar
stories.blurb: A lion and a boar fight over water but realize danger makes enemies unite.
stories.moral: In times of danger, cooperation is wiser than conflict.

stories.title: The North Wind and the Sun
stories.blurb: The wind and the sun compete to see who is stronger.
stories.moral: Gentle persuasion is stronger than force

stories.title: The Farmer and His Sons
stories.blurb: A farmer teaches his sons the value of hard work.
stories.moral: Hard work brings its own reward.

stories.title: The Crow and the Pitcher
stories.blurb: A crow uses intelligence to solve a problem.
stories.moral: Clever thinking can solve difficult problems
